divs: Sighting DetailsI saw 3 ufo,s the middle one seemed Larger or closer to my eyesight,it was exactly like your pic #12 in Texas 2007.I saw them several times hovering for while then they moved slowly at first then seemed to disappear!I have a website with UFO on it (I am a FIRM believer and this is not the first time either in my life)I studied Paranormal events for 30 yrs. especially UFO's and my latest finding is that a discovery of a device in a ufo from area 51 has a map of the universe and a device which creates its own wormhole enables the craft to seem to disappear and warp time and space traveling faster than the speed of light to cover enormous short-cut distances in space.I might even be an abductee cause I was having missing time events!
